munchlax.lib.file module¶

class munchlax.lib.file.File(slack, file)[source]¶

Bases: munchlax.lib.object.Object

add_reaction(name)[source]¶

Adds a reaction to the file.

Parameters:name (str) –

The name of the reaction to add.

A list of standard Slack reactions/emoji can be found at https://www.webpagefx.com/tools/emoji-cheat-sheet/
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
comment(comment)[source]¶

Adds a comment to the file.

Parameters:comment (str) – The comment string.
Returns:A Comment object representing the new comment.
Return type:Comment
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
delete()[source]¶

Deletes the file.

Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
get_channels()[source]¶

Fetches and returns an async iterator of all channels this file has been shared in.

``` async for channel in file.get_channels():

await channel.write(‘hello, world!’)

```

Returns:An async iterator of all channels.
Return type:List<Channel>
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
get_comments(count=100, page=1)[source]¶

Fetches and returns the comments for the file.

Parameters:
  • count (int) –

    The number of comments per page to return.

    Defaults to 100.

  • page (int) –

    The comments page number to use.

    Defaults to 1
Returns:

A list of Comment objects for the query. object: A generic object containing paging information.
Return type:

list<Comment>
Raises:

SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
get_reactions()[source]¶

Fetches and returns a list of all reactions for the file.

Returns:A list of generic objects with reaction data.
Return type:list<Object>
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
remove_reaction(name)[source]¶

Removes a reaction from the file.

Parameters:name (str) – The name of the reaction to remove.
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
revoke()[source]¶

Revokes the file from being shared publicly.

This will cause the current File object o become stale.

Returns:
An updated File object without the public URL for
the file.
Return type:File
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
share()[source]¶

Creates a public URL for the file.

This will cause the current File object to become stale.

Returns:
An updated File object with the public URL for
the file.
Return type:File
Raises:SlackError – Raised in the event that Slack does not return “ok”.
